resources.string: Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history

Welcome! To get started, press the + button from the main screen to set up a new monitor. 

Set the length of time for it to run as well as the sound threshold level. The bottom meter shows the active sound level. Any sound louder than the threshold level will cause the timer to reset and start over. To start it simply tap on an existing monitor or start it from the editing page.

To edit an existing one, press and hold until it pops into the editing screen. 

To monitor from another device, start a monitor running on one device and the on another device tap the microphone button on the main screen. Once connected, it should show the sound levels and the time left. Both devices must be on the same wifi network. If it does not work, check to be sure the option is not turned off in the settings on the device running the monitor.

To see this screen again, press the 3 dots in the upper left hand corner and select help.

Welcome! To see this screen again, press the 3 dots in the upper left hand corner and select help.

To get started, press the + button above to set up a new monitor. 

Set the length of time for it to run as well as the sound threshold level. The bottom meter shows the active sound level. Any sound louder than the threshold level will cause the timer to reset and start over. To start it simply tap on an existing monitor or start it from the editing page.

To edit an existing one, press and hold until it pops into the editing screen. 

To monitor from another device, start a monitor running on one device and the on another device tap the microphone button above. Once connected, it should show the sound levels and the time left. Both devices must be on the same wifi network. If it does not work, check to be sure the option is not turned off in the settings on the device running the monitor.
